p.b: The word mush has more than one meaning.

questionBody.p: Choose the sentence in which mush means "something soft, thick, and shapeless."

simpleChoice.p: In the Antarctic Ice Marathon, dog sled racers mush for 26.2 miles in the freezing cold.
Keith thought the romantic movie was too sweet and full of mush.
On cold days, I love to eat a scoop of oatmeal or cornmeal mush boiled in milk.
When the sled drivers neared the finish line, they all were yelling "Mush!"
